page.title: 02TOURISM(Continued)
page.content:
{WILDLIFE You will find in any town birds wherever you go.If you are lucky you will see a badger (if you are up in the dark).There are no nature reserves.In our opinion there should be one.Here are some names of birds you get in Hexham in winter: Gulls,Robins.In summer Martins,House ,Sand,Swallows,Cuckoos,Finches, Starlings,Blackcap,Thrushes;Song and Mistle Woodpeckers,Jays,House sparrows.
At Acomb at the other side is Meeting Of The Waters it is a good place to see Wildlife like birds,in our opinion it should be protected.You can see,Kingfishers,Heron Warblers, Mallards,Partridge,Otters,Rabbits.
